snippet: A new provocative opera, “Dog Days,” tells the story of a rural family struggling to survive and cohere in the wake of an apocalyptic catastrophe. Will only the strong survive?
abstract: Steve Smith reviews premiere of David T Little and Royce Vavrek opera Dog Days as part of the Peak Performances series at Montclair State University; Robert Woodruff directs and Lauren Worsham and John Kelly star.
lead_paragraph: A new provocative opera, “Dog Days,” tells the story of a rural family struggling to survive and cohere in the wake of an apocalyptic catastrophe. Will only the strong survive?

headline.seo: ‘Dog Days,’ New Opera, at Peak Performances in Montclair
